content: Patient 88742-LZW (DOB 04/15/1987) presented with persistent dactylitis and nail pitting at Banner Arthritis Center. Initial treatment plan included methotrexate + prednisone taper. Prior auth submitted for TNF inhibitor under exception criteria per Policy #BIOL-441. Provider phone: 602-555-0187. Next follow-up scheduled 12 weeks post-treatment initiation.
